testcase.classname: F01_Register | users could register with new accounts
testcase.name: user could register with valid data successfully
testcase.system-out: Given user go to register page..............................................passed And user select gender type and enter first name "automation" and last name "tester".passed And user enter date of birth................................................passed And user enter email "test@example.com" field and password fields "P@ssw0rd" "P@ssw0rd".passed Then user clicks on register button.........................................passed And success message is displayed............................................passed

testcase.classname: F02_Login | users could use login functionality to use their accounts
testcase.name: user could login with valid email and password
testcase.system-out: When user go to login page..................................................passed Then user login with valid "test0@example.com" and "P@ssw0rd"...............passed And user press on login button..............................................passed And user login to the system successfully...................................passed

testcase.classname: F02_Login | users could use login functionality to use their accounts
testcase.name: user could login with invalid email and password
testcase.system-out: When user go to login page..................................................passed Then user login with invalid "wrong@example.com" and "P@ssw0rd".............passed And user click on login button..............................................passed And user could not login to the system......................................passed

testcase.classname: F03_currencies | user should be able to change the currency.
testcase.name: deal with the dropdown menu elements.
testcase.system-out: And Select Euro currency from the dropdown list on the top left of home page.passed And verify that Euro Symbol (€) is shown on the 4 products displayed in Home page.passed

testcase.name: Verify that the home slider first image navigates to the correct page.

failure.message: Not The Same Link expected same:<https://demo.nopcommerce.com/nokia-lumia-1020> was not:<https://demo.nopcommerce.com/>

testcase.failure:
